title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve
title_original: Karen Thomas 100% Pure Cashmere Turtleneck Sweater Women - Pullover, Slim Fit, Soft and Warm Long Sleeve Sweater

specs.Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here
specs.Best Sellers Rank: #808,579 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #5,977 in Women's Pullover Sweaters

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Sweaters > Pullovers

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like it
items.body: I absolutely love this sweater,I can wear it with any blazer. It’s so soft and the size is perfect. Read more
items.author: Larisa

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Runs small
items.body: This is a nice basic cashmere sweater. The sleeves and bottom of the sweater have ribbed edges. I normally wear between a medium and a large. I order a large and is a close fit. The bottom of the sweater falls about 2 inches below my natural waist. My height is 5'2" and the sleeves are overly long which is odd since all other regular sized clothing fits a bit longer. Read more
items.author: B. Smith

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great foundational piece
items.body: As my daughter starts to build her professional wardrobe, I knew this would be a great foundational piece. The cashmere sweater in solid black would allow her to layer blazers over it. The color is an intense black and has held up to cleaning. The material is so soft and comfortable that it’s not too hot. A little expensive but should last a long time. Read more
items.author: VisualSol

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Horrible smell
items.body: This is a nice sweater but has a horrible smell. I hung it outside 12 hours, then washed it. No change and not returnable. A disappointment. I cannot recommend. Read more
items.author: DS in SFO

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Runs small
items.body: This is a beautiful cashmere sweater. The quality is excellent. It is a slim fit so it feels like it runs small to me. I suggest ordering one size up. The sweater is very soft and does have some stretch. I hand wash cold an lay flat to dry. Read more
items.author: Leah Maines, best-selling, award-winning author, actor, and editor

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice quality, interesting fabric
items.body: The turtleneck is really soft and stretchy, it is also very cozy. Overall its great quality but the texture of the fabric is a bit strange. Read more
items.author: Travis L.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
